channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Floating Notification Bar, Sticky Menu on Scroll, and Sticky Header for Any Theme – myStickymenu
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Floating Notification Bar, Sticky Menu on Scroll, and Sticky Header for Any Theme – myStickymenu

item.title: CVE-2021-24425|2024-08-03T19:28:23.900Z -- unknown -- floating%20notification%20bar%2C%20sticky%20menu%20on%20scroll%2C%20and%20sticky%20header%20for%20any%20theme%20%E2%80%93%20mystickymenu
item.description: The Floating Notification Bar, Sticky Menu on Scroll, and Sticky Header for Any Theme – myStickymenu WordPress plugin before 2.5.2 does not sanitise or escape its Bar Text settings, allowing hight privilege users to use malicious JavaScript in it, leading to a Stored Cross-Site Scripting issue, which will be triggered in the plugin's setting, as well as all front-page of the blog (when the Welcome bar is active)
